name: Alaska Violet
indications: unable to actualize one's life purpose in a practical way on the physical plane.
effects: supports us in finding the right energetic relationship with ourselves, others and the environment, especially in crowded situations
helps us create a quiet place inside where the flame of love and enthusiasm for our life's work can be nourished and protected.

name: Alpine Arnica
indications: over identification with emotional traumas and wounds from the past
effects: illuminates the relationship between old emotional and mental imbalances and the pain we are feeling in our bodies
helps us let go of our accumulation of past hurts without going through every detail of what happened and why
promotes ease, deep calm and balance.
keywords: Alignment, Calm, Forgiveness, Realignment, Release, Relief, Suffering

name: Angelica
indications: feeling lost or abandoned and without spiritual protection
effects: connects us to the protective energies of the angelic kingdom
promotes acceptance of spiritual support in all situations
helps us experience protection as coming from a certainty of our Divine nature.
keywords: Abandonment, Childbirth, Children, Death & Dying, Fear, Love, Opening, Protection, Receptivity, Support

name: Bleeding Heart
indications: lack of compassion for ourselves and others
effects: promotes loving kindness
helps us resolve the polarities of love/separation and joy/suffering by opening the heart to compassion for all beings.
keywords: Abandonment, Alienation, Compassion, Devotion, Forgiveness, Freedom, Heart, Joy, Loss, Suffering

name: Blue Poppy
indications: weak or dysfunctional connection between the spiritual and sexual aspects of self
lack of balance between the inner male and female.
effects: helps us unify all aspects of our masculine and feminine characteristics within our physical bodies
promotes purity of passion in service to Spirit.
keywords: Alignment, Balance, Balancing, Feminine, Masculine, Sensuality/Sexuality

name: Bog Candle
indications: caught up in confusion, shame, fear and guilt
prone to destructive or degrading tendencies
effects: support for cycles of initiation, death and rebirth
enables us to emerge from a deep experience of transformation with a new sense of wisdom
helps us bring discarded aspects of ourselves back to the embrace of Divine love.
keywords: Critical, Death & Dying, Peace, Rebirthing, Releasing, Transformation

name: Chocolate Lily
indications: over-reactive to situations beyond our control
low endurance and fatigue from chronically over-extending ourselves past the point of tiredness.
effects: reveals how everything in life is connected to our center
opens awareness of our center's connection to the source of our vitality
helps us open to and hold our life experiences with more spaciousness and less reactivity.

name: Cloudberry
indications: looking outside of ourselves for insight and answers
obsessed with trying to figure things out.
effects: helps us learn to change by surrendering to our inner vision
for replacing low self-esteem with an awareness of inner value
helps us open to the true source of our being and reflect this out into the world for others to see.

name: Club Moss
indications: resistance to being here on Earth
little or no awareness of one's connection to the planet.
effects: helps us make a direct, present-time connection to the Earth
helps us go to deeper levels of relaxation, enjoyment, and manifestation
solidifies a base of energy in the body for the further development of higher functions
quiets the body, emotions and mind.
keywords: Ambivalence, Birth, Embodiment, Grounding, Manifest, Stabilize

name: Comfrey
indications: unresolved trauma and injuries from the past
energy loss for no apparent reason.
effects: supports healing on all levels
heals etheric body damage when there has been an injury in this or another lifetime
promotes the embodiment of higher spiritual energies and the expression of our Divine potential.
keywords: Accidents, Completion, Earth Healing, Etheric, Massage Therapy/Body Work, Recovery, Regeneration

name: Crowberry
indications: life filled with inner conflict and attachment to outcome
unable to find or maintain one's center in a difficult or oppressive situation.
effects: helps us find empowerment in the depths of struggle
stimulates awareness of cycles of light and darkness, internally and externally
enables us to hold these polarities with respect and gratitude, rather than with attachment or aversion.

name: Devil's Club
indications: feel like there is not enough room to be fully present
defining one's personal space is a constant struggle.
effects: clears ambivalence about being present in our physical bodies and on the Earth
helps us experience peace from knowing we are secure and in harmony with our surroundings
helps us express our truth firmly and clearly from the heart.
keywords: Ambivalence, Boundaries, Children, Clutter Clearing, Grounding, Harmony, Protection, Safety, Vulnerability

name: Dwarf Fireweed
indications: overwhelmed during any kind of transformative healing process.
effects: helps us open to and experience transformation with gentleness, grace and ease
helps us fine tune how we move through a healing process so we do not create more difficulties or pain.

name: Enchanter's Nightshade
indications: fear and avoidance of the inner recesses of the psyche
effects: balances the polarities of light and shadow, expansion and contraction
heals imbalances that are created by too much exposure to the light
helps one find peace, protection, safety and security through the release of fear.

name: Fairy Slipper
indications: not wanting to stand out and be noticed
spiritual potential and wisdom not activated or manifested in the physical body.
effects: support for standing in our power and beauty, and for projecting our unique individuality in a clear way
helps us manifest our spiritual wisdom through our physical bodies
strengthens the male principle in men and women
promotes clear communication through alignment with Earth and spirit
keywords: Abuse, Father, Fear, Feminine, Individuality, Masculine, Potential, Power, Public Speaking, Wisdom

name: False Hellebore
indications: stuck in old ways of viewing life
inflexibility based on a fear of moving forward.
effects: promotes the release of false concepts and assumptions
catalyzes movement from the old to the new
helps us face and liberate our deepest, darkest fears.

name: Goatsbeard
indications: creative processes are dreamy and unfocused
lack of joy and fun in life
effects: joy through optimism
supports the manifestation of positive reality
helps those who are highly energized mentally to ground and focus that creative energy into the physical body.
keywords: Anxiety, Creativity, Inspiration, Joy, Manifesting, Optimism, Power

name: Ladies' Mantle
indications: shame and vulnerability around one's sexuality
loss of innocence through the experience of abuse
effects: promotes the release of sadness and despair
strengthens our relationship to the sacred feminine
heals the feminine connection between sensuality, creativity and divinity
helps men balance their relationship with feminine power within themselves and with others.
keywords: Abuse, Childbirth, Empowered/Empowerment, Feminine, Grief, Loss, Power, Pre-Menstrual, Sadness, Sensuality/Sexuality, Suffering

name: Lapland Rosebay
indications: lack of trust in one's intuition
prone to mental confusion and circular thinking.
effects: penetrating insight into the self and all of nature
seeing without distortion
brings us back to our senses when we have been looking outside of ourselves for answers
reminds us to look to the heart for perspective and direction.

name: Lavender Yarrow
indications: integrity of the aura has been compromised by imbalances or damage in the higher chakras and subtle bodies.
effects: gives strength and protection to the higher chakras
heals the depletion that results from a chaotic influx of energy through the crown chakra
balances the flow of spiritual energy into the heart chakra.
keywords: Children, Environment, Massage Therapy/Body Work, Protection, Sensitivity, Vulnerability

name: Lilac
indications: weak vertical alignment affecting energy inflow and circulation
over concern for our own stories and struggles.
effects: aligns the chakras with each other so that they can more fully receive and embody healing energy from the Spiritual dimensions
helps us gracefully raise the frequency of our energy fields.

name: Nootka Lupine
indications: resignation about one's place in life
vulnerable to influences from the past
lacking the courage and confidence to confront and resolve karmic issues.
effects: helps us confront and address deep karmic issues that surface repeatedly for resolution
shows where our awareness and energy need to be focused in order to transform these matters.

name: Northern Coral Root
indications: holding on to toxic and distorted thoughts and emotions
lack of awareness of one's energetic connection to the planet
effects: helps us transmute toxic and distorted emotions, thought forms, and energies into Light
promotes awareness and respect for our symbiotic relationship with the Earth
teaches us how to get what we need by grounding and connecting our heart and spirit to our physical environment.
keywords: Addictions, Belonging, Cleansing, Clutter Clearing, Communication, Detoxification, Purification, Space Clearing

name: Northern Green Orchid
indications: expressions of power and love are not aligned
effects: promotes a higher degree of horizontal and vertical alignment
helps us embody our mastery and power and express it through our hearts with integrity and love
teaches us how to join our hearts together in love and shared higher purpose.

name: Pale Corydalis
indications: lack of commitment or clear intention in a relationship
holding back because of a fear of losing oneself
unable to see the higher purpose of a relationship.
effects: helps us develop a stronger sense of who we are in our relationships
aligns and integrates personal and Divine will within the heart
balances addictive and conditional patterns of loving
helps us see our relationships as catalysts for spiritual growth.

name: Pasque Flower
indications: loses sense of self in crowded or intimate situations.
effects: helps us create and maintain security through functional energy boundaries
helps us feel respected, appreciated and protected, and maintain our deepest sense of personal identity in all situations.
keywords: Alienation, Boundaries, Individuality, Intimacy, Oversensitive, Protection, Security, Sensitivity,Sensuality/Sexuality, Vulnerability

name: Potato
effects: physical release
for thawing out incomplete cycles of experience that are being held in the body
encourages love and self-acceptance to penetrate into every cell of the body.
keywords: Flexibility, Massage Therapy/Body Work, Release, Resilience

name: Purple Poppy
indications: difficulty keeping up with the pace of change in one's life
disorientation and fatigue from too much going on
effects: helps us maintain balance during rapid phases of evolution—when our entire vibrational makeup is undergoing transformation
helps us experience deep levels of integration and rest while allowing the transformative process to continue.

name: Red Elder
indications: feeling unsupported by one's physical environment
focus in life is scattered and diffuse.
effects: for contracting overly expanded states of being
helps us view life from the center rather than from the periphery
improves our grounding and physical presence by helping us release mental and emotional tension into the Earth.

name: Red-Purple Poppy
indications: stagnant energy flow in the lower chakras
feeling a lack of guidance and support from the spiritual realms.
effects: for balancing extremes between physical and etheric frequencies of energy
helps us focus on the survival and spiritual aspects of life in an integrated way
supports us in making full use of our physical capacities to embody spirit.

name: Reindeer Moss
indications: significant, sudden changes in life, such as a loss of one's home or business due to circumstances beyond one's control.
effects: for humans and animals who have suffered a loss of connection with their ancestral home and habitats
opens awareness of the constant and eternal nature of life.
keywords: Abandonment, Acceptance, Alienation, Ancestral Healing, Belonging, Earth Healing, Grief, Loss, Space Clearing, Suffering

name: Round-Leaf Orchid
indications: distracted and unable to stay focused on the issue or task at hand
not tending to one's heart in troubled times.
effects: support to live more deeply in our hearts and maintain that position in times of confusion and chaos
promotes equanimity and balance
helps us get to and stay with the core of an issue without being distracted by all of the energy at the periphery.

name: Self-Heal
indications: resistance to receiving healing energy and support from others.
effects: promotes self-esteem, self-acceptance, and an expansion of love and compassion for ourselves
helps strengthen our belief in our body's inherent ability to heal itself.

name: Star Gentian
indications: lack of devotion and commitment to higher ideals
tendency to compete rather than cooperate.
effects: supports the resolution of inner conflicts so we can better focus our energy towards goals of higher service
helps men reclaim their spiritual self-image
supports men in serving the Divine feminine
helps bring about a higher degree of balance and equanimity between men and women as both are engaged in service to higher purpose.

name: Starflower
indications: weak connection to family and home.
effects: a soothing, comforting energy of purity, refinement and innocence
promotes individuality and free expression of self
enables us to maintain our sense of self in crowded situations, regardless of competition for resources or lack of space.
keywords: Abundance, Alienation, Belonging, Childbirth, Children, Confidence, Innocence, Purity, Sharing

name: Stinging Nettle
indications: getting angry, upset and disconnected when there is too much to do.
effects: helps those who are highly sensitive stay connected to the Earth and to their feelings
heals alienation in those who have been hurt deeply and have a tendency to repel those they want to be close to
promotes grounding and reconnection after being overwhelmed by too much input.
keywords: Abandonment, Alienation, Anxiety, Critical, Defensiveness, Integration, Irritation, Oversensitive,Overwhelmed, Sensitive

name: Valerian
indications: difficulty relaxing the mind and body
effects: encourages the feeling of comfort in every day existence
helps us slow down in order to gain perspective on our priorities
especially when we feel pressured to do or decide
promotes the willingness to surrender to natural urges for rest and nurturing.

name: White Lupine
indications: caught up in ancestral patterns and unhealthy family dynamics
invested in old family resentments and grudges.
effects: supports the emergence of a new archetype of male spirituality
stimulates the release of familial and tribal karmic patterns of behavior, and old treasured wounds and grievances, without reactivity or attachment.

name: Wild Sweet Pea
indications: lack of confidence in social skills
tendency to isolate rather than seek meaningful contact with others.
effects: promotes confidence and ease in our interactions with others
supports the outward expression and sharing of our talents and abilities, and encourages us to share our best in service to others.
keywords: Confidence, Courage, Creativity, Homeless, Isolation, Open

name: Yellow Paintbrush
indications: inspiration and creative energies are not harmonized
creative process is disjointed and stagnant
effects: facilitates the release of emotional frustrations and feelings of self-limitation that block our creative expression
helps us open and cleanse the heart so that it may act as a focal point for the sharing of our creative energies.

name: Yellow Violet
indications: distress and dread around public speaking
self-expression blocked by the fear of being judged or ridiculed.
effects: fearlessness
gives us the strength and confidence to naturally express the essence of our beings without limitation, compromise or self-consciousness, in all circumstances
gives protection to the act of verbal expression, especially when there is a challenge or controversy around what needs to be said.
keywords: Balance, Communication, Confidence, Defensiveness, Fear, Public Speaking, Self-Expression
